title: CraftZ插件的问题
txt_content:
就是那个模仿MINEZ的插件，我不会设置= =

僵尸不会自然生成= =僵尸没有跑很快= =

各种问题

http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=95284&highlight=craftz

replies.txt_content:
config.yml里的设置：# ++===================================================++
# || Configuration for the CraftZ plugin by JangoBrick ||
# ++===================================================++
Config:
  world:
    name: world
    lobby:
      radius: 200
      x: 0
      y: 73
      z: 0
    real-time: true
    world-border:
      enable: true
      radius: 600
    world-changing:
      allow-burning: false
      allow-block-grow: false
      allow-tree-grow: false
    weather:
      allowWeatherChanging: true
  players:
    interact:
      shearing: false
      sleeping: false
      block-breaking: false
      block-placing: false
      allow-spiderweb-placing: true
    medical:
      enable-sugar-speed-effect: true
      bleeding:
        enable: true
        chance: 0.04
        heal-with-paper: true
      healing:
        heal-with-rosered: true
        only-healing-others: true
      poisoning:
        enable: true
        chance: 0.04
        cure-with-limegreen: true
  mobs:
    blood-particles-when-damaged: true
    zombies:
      enable-drops: true
      drops:
        chance: 2.0
        rottenflesh: true
        arrows: false
      spawning:
        interval: 40
        maxzombies: 200
    animals:
      spawning:
        enable: true
        chance:
          cow: 0.0
          chicken: 0.0
          pig: 0.01
          sheep: 0.0
  chat:
    modify-join-and-quit-messages: true
    modify-player-messages: false
    modify-death-messages: true
  vehicles:
    enable: false
    speed: 5.0
    speed-street-multiplier: 1.6
    speed-street-blocks:
    - '35:7'
    - '35'
    - '35:15'
    street-border-blocks:
    - '43'
    - '44'
  change-item-names:
    enable: true
    names:
    - 339=Bandage
    - 351:1=Blood Bag
    - 351:10=Antibiotics
    - 371=Money
复制代码
